comments:
Build: 3.0 M8.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.4.2_03-b02, mixed mode)

Running the workspace tests on a dual processor Xeon (dual 3 Ghz, 1 GB RAM) I
get occasional exceptions and NullPointerExceptions. They are very infrequent
and inconsistent. I will use this bug report to track them to see if I can find
a pattern.
NPE in IResourceTest.testRefreshLocal:

Assertion failed in JobTest.testSetThread.

This one could be valid: per-processor caching of "thread" field on job may
result in stale values returned by getThread(). This needs a synchronized barrier.

 Note that periodic test failures are catalogued in bug 51538.
